sys_script.name: Transaction done

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_b0c9e25a87b08190baf50fa90cbb3532
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_hconnector_accountcreate</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_hconnector_accountcreate">status=done^EQ<item display_value="done" endquery="false" field="status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="done"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Transaction done</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    try {
        output = JSON.parse(current.output)

        current.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId
        current.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash

        current.account_id = output.receipt.accountId

        gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hconnector_account")
        gr.initialize()
        gr.name = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.account_id = output.receipt.accountId
        gr.insert()

        current.account = gr.sys_id

        if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') {
            current.status = 'completed'
            current.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        } else {
            throw Error("Hedera status is not success")
        }
		
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error(e)
        current.out_parsing_log = e.toString()
		current.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        current.status = 'failed'
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-04 14:53:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b0c9e25a87b08190baf50fa90cbb3532</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Transaction done</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="hconnector" source="x_snc_hconnector">0e01e57e874c8190baf50fa90cbb354e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="hconnector">0e01e57e874c8190baf50fa90cbb354e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b0c9e25a87b08190baf50fa90cbb3532</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-04 17:59:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b0c9e25a87b08190baf50fa90cbb3532"/></record_update>
